contentList.content: Does not spend a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Deal normal damage to target and an additional half damage to the second target in 9 meters. Applies special weapon effects to both targets.
You and nearby allies gain <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1].

You or an ally's weapon attacks deal an additional radiant damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">modifier</LSTag> and can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Daze</LSTag> enemies for 1 turn.
Deal damage and weaken a foe: they deal half damage with weapon attacks using <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.
Protect allies against the attacks and powers of aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

A creature walking on the spikes must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping Wounds</LSTag>.

Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. Movement is halved. A creature walking on the spikes must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping Wounds</LSTag>.
